name: Don't Talk to the Wizard - Final
name_original: Don't Talk to the Wizard - Final
description: Don't Talk to the Wizard is a mini-game compilation developed by 4 UC Berkeley students. Enter a world where magic exists! In this world you can turn into a cat and use fire balls to melt ice; however, it is HIGHLY recommended that you don't talk to the wizard. Just don't it. Don't even think about it. NO.
